item.dungeonsmod.sun_overdrive.denied: The sun inside is no longer warm
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside1.page0: Mr Bones will bring you grace and luck, just touch not his head or bring ghosts on the night he will. Dont pour ghost souls into his head, awakened Mr Bones should never be .
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside1.page1: Shaman protect Mr Bones until dead come he must.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside1.author: Shaman
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside1.title: Avocation
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside21.page0: Have you heard about the Winter Hunter? Snowy places are her home, wandering on all the places leaving traps understanding all the wild animals and plants there.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside21.page1: Hope you don't fall in her traps unarmored, nobody have survived them for tell.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbookside21.title: Warning
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook0.page0: Coal block its for what I came, Coal block is always from I will be, Flinting a coal block will invoke me.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook0.author: Traveler
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook0.title: The Search
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook1.page0: On the village, there was a sorcerer. He was unfriendly and hydrofobic, at the point that one day, he leave. Some rumours says that, he moved to a desert, alone, when nobody annoys him. He is a fire sorcerer, and can manipulate fire easily. Don't play with fire near him.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook1.author: Anonymous Villager
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook1.title: The Lonely Villager
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook2.page0: Miners running, from something. never seen before on the new mine, an monster born near us. All the iron eated by it, turned him into an hard ferrous goo. Nobody could stop it, we are the mans in charge to seal the mine. If I were to die, I write this book as advice for all who come.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook2.author: Foreman
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook2.title: Checklist Day 10
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook3.page0: 'tis me last. Tried t' escape but no choice, gonna ship this in a bottle. I forgot t' recharge on th' port.. Shiver me timbers, only needed t' shoot on th' tentacles joints...
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook3.author: Captain Crunch
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook3.title: Grand Finale
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook4.page0: Reporting: they have a LOT of armaments, probably the most powerful king of all earth. You should go at your own risk.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook4.page1: Guards: they tent to attack anything near. And those who are special to the king, give them a great amount of power.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook4.page2: King: this guy is a strange case of ambidextrous. He became so crazy with gold blocks, everyone that want to be near him, should offer a sacrifice over the obsidian blocks, Be cautious, or can be catastrophic. Note: Eating near is considered sacrilege, and is punished with
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook4.author: Spy
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook4.title: Richie
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook5.page0: On the most strange places, an massive organization hides. Some group of villagers developed an awesome brain long ago.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook5.page1: We decided to fund an secret lab, that contains the, probably, most advanced technology available. But one day, we founded an massive strange creature that could manipulate incredible amounts of redstone power, that even make your items damage you when it coils.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook5.page2: The leader decided to conduct a lot of experiments, at the point the lab practically combined with the it, 10 redstone blocks that feed that beast over quartz altars, making him an almost inmortal lifeform.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook5.page3: We needed to build an obsidian bunker around it because nobody move from where it was found or theres an high chance to be killed by his jump. My reason to leave was him becoming bigger. Got afraid to afront it. My colleges will protect their experiments at all cost.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook5.author: Retired Scientist
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook5.title: Craft Mesa
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook6.page0: I got an pact with the Sun, now I have an uncontainable power. Im pleased, I want to be with my Lord Sun.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook6.page1: Im tired of this village, they dont have idea of the power out this lands. Im gonna travel thought the desert, finding an nether portal.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook6.page2: To fusion with my Lord I need less than one 6 health points, hold 6 blocks of iron on my main hand and 6 armor points. Casting me into fire.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook6.page3: I hope I got at time before the scientist discover how to decipher the book they've founded containing harmful altars to the sun.
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook6.author: Firellager
item.dungeonsmod.writtenbook6.title: Almighty
